name: Unicycle Balancing
description:
You are a unicycle rolling in the sky while random stuff falls on you.

Survive the barrage of blocks as long as you can while you try to find your balance.

How To Play
  • Survive as long as you can on the rope.
  • You game-over when are leaning more than 45° to one side.
  • Objects fall from the sky on the board that put you out of balance.
  • Lean left or right to compensate for the falling objects.
  • A preview window for the drop locations may help you to judge your next actions.
  • Every 5 seconds new objects drop from the sky.
  • Every 20 seconds an additional object is added to the object drops.
Controls

Keyboard

  • Lean left: A and left arrow
  • Lean right: D and right arrow

Game Controller 

  • Lean left and right: left stick horizontal axis
